name: Wiz, Sage of the Skyfang Brigade
desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can gain 500 LP for each "Skyfang Brigade" monster you control with a different name, except "Wiz, Sage of the Skyfang Brigade". When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 "Skyfang Brigade" card; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Wiz, Sage of the Skyfang Brigade" once per turn.
